title: Orientale Mare/Gangeticus Sinus/Eous Oceanus
description: Ancient Greek and Roman sources refer to the Bay of Bengal, forms the northeastern portion of the Indian Ocean, by these names. It was also sometimes construed as an ocean entirely surrounding Asia.

properties.description: The Bay of Bengal is the largest bay in the world and forms the northeastern part of the Indian Ocean. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Bay of Bengal
